arts.ttl: Man Utd handed DREAM Osimhen swap deal chance
arts.sum: However, Rashford could be handed the perfect Man Utd escape route by Conte, with the ex-Chelsea boss eager to bring the Englishman to Napoli in January, according to The Sun .
